channel.title: Home on Bing Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Bing Academy

item.title: College Planning
item.description: We take a holistic approach to guide students preparing for college applications. College Planning Services | 大学升学规划服务 We help students plan for various aspects of their high school years | 我们从以下申请要素，帮助孩子做量身定制的规划： Courses (what and when to take) | 如何选课 Standardized tests (what and when to take) | 标准测验 Extracurricular activities (academic and non-academic work) | 课外活动（学术和非学术及志愿活动） Volunteer service opportunities | 提供义工服务 Summer activities selection and application | 暑期活动的选择和申请 A counselor will meet with the student once a month and communicate with parents/student whenever needed.

More than 20 years ago, we immigrated to the United States with a common goal for our children: to have the best education, live a prosperous life, and have an unlimited and bright future. We started getting involved in the American education system in 2004, and began college planning for our children as early as elementary school. There were no suitable counselors or programs for us at that time. Instead, we learned through books and online research; we studied cases personally by reaching out to universities, parents, teachers, and students.
Number of Students we worked with in private consultation: 2019: 44 2018: 37 2017: 32 2016: 27 2015: 28 2010-2014: 30

item.title: College Application
item.description: We support students step-by-step through the college application process. College Application Services | 大学申请服务 We help students with college applications in the following ways | 我们通过以下服务帮助孩子申请理想的大学： Selecting colleges | 大学挑选 Brainstorming essay topics | 作文题目辅导 Editing essays | 作文修改 Organizing application information | 信息整理 Filling out application forms | 申请表格填写 Training for interviews | 面试辅导

item.title: Classes
item.description: We offer instruction on various high school subjects. Classes SAT I SAT II ACT AP Economics AP Chinese AP Computer Science AP Physics Contact us for information about upcoming classes!

High Schools Represented: • Amador Valley • American • Bellarmine • Dougherty • Dublin High • Foothill • Gunn • Harker • Irvington • Leland • Lynbrook • Mission San Jose • Monte Vista • Palo Alto • Phillips Exeter • Pinewood • Saratoga • St. Francis • Washington • Wuhan Yucai International School

item.title: Financial Aid Free Counseling
item.description: Financial Aid Free Counseling We provide free financial aid counseling for all families, contact us for more information! 我们为所有家庭提供免费的申请奖学金、助学金、财务规划，请联系我们获取更多信息！

“I would like to report to you that P’s AP physics scored 4! He also got a B for the second semester AP Physics class. Teacher, you really have the invincible power that is out of this universe, transforming P’s score from Incomplete to B.” “跟老师报告一下，P的AP物理考了四分，第二学期物理拿了B。 老师您真的有超级宇宙无敌的神力，把P的成绩从I变成了B。”

“Bill’s AP scores are great. Thank you very much for the encouragement, especially thank teacher Jia for her encouragement and helpful tutoring. We are grateful to choose you as our conselors.” “Bill的AP成绩非常棒非常感谢老师们的鼓励，尤其感谢贾老师耐心和辛勤的教导，遇到你们真的是太幸运了。”

“Thank you, Teacher Jia, my daughter has scored 5 on both AP Economics test. My child admires you very much. Every time she came back from your tutoring, she would excitedly talked about how you helped her to thoroughly understand the concepts. My second child will definitely study economics and SAT with you.” “谢谢贾老师，孩子两门经济学都考了5分。我孩子非常崇拜您，每次从您那补习回来，都满脸兴奋地说，贾老师讲的太好了！我家老二过几年也要跟您学经济学和SAT.”
“Thank you very much for your patience and encouragement. Your service is awesome, I will recommend your service to all my friends.” “非常感谢法老师和贾老师的耐心帮助和鼓励。你们的服务非常好，我会向所有的朋友推荐你们的服务。”

“My son’s GPA is not good enough to get into USC. Thank you very much for your help. My son really admires you, saying that you are great at college essay editing.” “肯定是贾老师的帮忙，他才能进USC，他的GPA根本就不合格。我儿子非常欣赏老师，一直说老师改文章很厉害。谢谢老师的帮助。”
